title: Jake Round from Pure Noise Records
itunes:title: Jake Round from Pure Noise Records
description:
I sat down with my old friend, Jake Round from Pure Noise Records, and discussed many things including the origins of the label, your own personal music taste being reflective of the music you put out and the struggles of gaining "legitimacy". As a bonus, I speak with our producer Tom at the top of the show about international touring and how different the experiences are. Visit Creative Live for amazing classes on everything you need to know about production, mastering, songwriting and more!Start your own amazing website with SQUARESPACE and enter the code WORDS for 10% off your order. Build it beautiful.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
